Chanity
// splash screen SplashScreen Chanity Logo
// welcome Welcome to Chanity! Please register or login first. Get Started Sign In
// register login Â© 2022 Chanity Password Email Ready to create your account? Welcome back!
// home Check your personality by taking this test! The Big Five personality test measures the five personality factors that psychologists have determined are core to our personality makeup. The Five Factors of personality consists of: Start Test Ocean Image
// test Answer each question according to how well it describes you.
Question %1$d/50
// option menu Change Language Log Out Home Very Inaccurate Inaccurate Neutral Accurate Very Accurate Your primary trait is Openness. Percentage Result OCEAN Result
%s%% %s%% %s%% %s%% %s%%
Strengths Weaknesses
The sub-traits of openness personality trait are: Imaginative, adventurous, have high artistic interests, and intelligent. Easy to collaborate with.
Creative.
Love to learn something new.
Open to diversity. Easily swayed.
Their ideas are often unconventional.
Unpredictable.
Tend to avoid positions that need to set rules and guidelines.
The sub-traits of conscientiousness personality trait are: Well-organized, confident, self-discipline and cautious. Organized and always come into situations prepared.
Attentive to detail.
Hardworking.
Rarely make impulsive or careless decisions. Perfectionist.
May be excessively serious in some situations.
Inflexible.
Struggle to be spontaneous.
The sub-traits of extraversion personality trait are: Friendly, have high activity level, excitement-seeking and cheerful. Tend to relate well to others.
Often well-liked in their teams and offices.
Form quick and easy friendships.
Their outgoing nature leads to effective group-work. May lack independence.
Can sometimes make others uncomfortable.
May be inconsiderate or sometimes socially unaware.
Often unable to make analytical, emotionless judgements.
The sub-traits of agreeableness personality trait are: Have high trust with people, good at cooperation, modest and sympathetic. Tend to get pleasure from taking care of people.
Get along well with others.
Form friendships easily.
Refrain to judging people. Struggle to assert their wants, needs and preferences.
Tend to forget to plan their own advancement.
Often likely to be taken advantage of.
Tend to overwork themselves.
The sub-traits of neuroticism personality trait are: Anxiety, high anger level, depressed, and have high self-consciousness. Sensitive.
Likely to be the one who is always looking out for others.
Realistic.
Have high self-awareness. Dramatic changes in feelings.
Tend to be more anxious when they perceive the situation to be negative.
Tend to experience a lot of stress.
Tend to self-doubt themselves.
Password is empty! Email is empty! Congrats! Your account is created. Login Next
Are you sure you want to exit the test? Warning Yes No Okay! Keep going!
//dummyQuestion I am the life of the party. I feel little concern for others. I am always prepared. I get stressed out easily. I have a rich vocabulary. I dont talk a lot. I am interested in people. I leave my belongings around. I am relaxed most of the time. I have a difficulty understanding abstract ideas. I feel comfortable around people. I insult people. I pay attention to details. I worry about things. I have a vivid imagination. I keep in the background. I sympathize with others feeling. I make a mess of things. I seldom feel blue. I am not interested in abstract ideas. I start conversations. I am not interested in other peoples problems. I get chores done right away. I am easily disturbed. I have excellent ideas. I have little to say. I have a soft heart. I often forget to put things back in their proper place. I get upset easily. I do not have a good imagination. I talk to a lot of different people at parties. I am not really interested in others. I like order. I change my mood a lot. I am quick to understand things. I dont like to draw attention to myself I take time out for others. I shirk my duties. I have frequent mood swings. I use difficult words. I dont mind being the center of attention. I feel others emotions. I follow a schedule. I get irritated easily. I spend time reflecting on things. I am quiet around strangers. I make people feel at ease. I am exacting in my work. I often feel blue. I am full of ideas.
//dummyResult
73,4% 71,0% 79,2% 59,4% 79,6%
41,8% 78,6% 69,4% 58,0% 74,6%

You are at the beginning of the application. Note:
1 - Very Inaccurate
2 - Inaccurate
3 - Neutral
4 - Accurate
5 - Very Accurate
